definition: an unintentional but embarrassing blunder, get high, stoned, or drugged
details:
noun
- an unintentional but embarrassing blunder
= example: an unintentional but embarrassing blunder
= synonyms: trip-up, stumble, misstep
- a light or nimble tread
= example: a light or nimble tread
- a journey for some purpose
= example: a journey for some purpose
- a catch mechanism that acts as a switch
= example: a catch mechanism that acts as a switch
= synonyms: tripper
- an exciting or stimulating experience
= synonyms: head trip
- an accidental misstep threatening (or causing) a fall
= synonyms: slip
- a hallucinatory experience induced by drugs
= example: a hallucinatory experience induced by drugs
verb
- get high, stoned, or drugged
= example: get high, stoned, or drugged
= synonyms: turn on, get off, trip out
- put in motion or move to act
= synonyms: trigger, spark, activate, set off, actuate, spark off, trigger off, touch off
- make a trip for pleasure
= synonyms: travel, jaunt
- miss a step and fall or nearly fall
= synonyms: stumble
- cause to stumble
= example: cause to stumble
= synonyms: trip up
